title: Bungoes: Sketches of Sailboats and Working Men, Along the Rio Magdalena, Colombia
description: Horizontal view showing in top row, at left:  a sail boat with three men in it, and a bank of the river; at right: a sail boat shown from the stern; at bottom left: a sail boat with one man in it and a river bank; at right: a walking man carrying wood on the back, shown form the back.
name: Drawing
